docs.snippet: U.S. regulators have charged two companies and three individuals with operating a pyramid scheme that made some $129 million from preying on investors in China, Taiwan and the U.S....

headline.main: SEC Alleges $129M Pyramid Scheme in China, US
headline.print_headline: SEC Alleges $129M Pyramid Scheme in China, US

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. regulators have charged two companies and three individuals with operating a pyramid scheme that made some $129 million from preying on investors in China, Taiwan and the U.S.

docs.snippet: Bill Gross's departure from investment firm Pimco could lead investors to pull hundreds of billions of dollars in assets from its parent company and invest them with Janus Capital Group, the rival firm that Gross is joining, a Morningstar analyst ...

headline.main: Allianz Could Face Hundreds of Billions in Outflows on Gross Exit - Morningstar
headline.print_headline: Allianz Could Face Hundreds of Billions in Outflows on Gross Exit - Morningstar

docs.lead_paragraph: Bill Gross's departure from investment firm Pimco could lead investors to pull hundreds of billions of dollars in assets from its parent company and invest them with Janus Capital Group, the rival firm that Gross is joining, a Morningstar analyst said Friday.

docs.snippet: Brussels-based designers Jorge Almada and Anne-Marie Midy couldn’t help but return to the remote beauty of his childhood home in the Sonoran desert to stake a claim of their own....
